definition: To send something or someone to a different location, typically through a postal or delivery service. It is commonly used when referring to the act of dispatching packages, letters, or goods to a recipient.

examples.german: Ich werde das Paket morgen verschicken.
examples.english: I will send the package tomorrow.

examples.german: Kannst du mir bitte den Brief verschicken?
examples.english: Can you please mail the letter for me?

examples.german: Er hat die Einladungen per E-Mail verschickt.
examples.english: He sent the invitations by email.

examples.german: Wir müssen die Bestellungen rechtzeitig verschicken.
examples.english: We need to send the orders on time.

examples.german: Sie verschickt regelmäßig Geschenke an ihre Freunde.
examples.english: She regularly sends gifts to her friends.
